content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day July 17, 2018 Cryptocurrency Exchange Targeted by Fake Phishing Site July 17, 2018 With the news about the Israeli Bancor heist breaking recently in which cryptocurrencies worth 23.5 million were stolen using a compromised wallet, its fairly obvious that the criminal attraction to cryptocurrencies hasnt been affected by recent dips in the value of currencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.
